description: As a student at Semarang State Polytechnic, I am dedicated to the development and assembly of appropriate technology, specifically microcontroller-based systems, and the practical implementation of sensors in industrial applications.
Praktik kerja lapangan di CV SiRobo yang bergerak dibidang robotik dan mikrokontroler.Pada magang tersebut kita mengerjakan sebuah projet yang berjudul Tempat Sampah Pintar Menggunakan YOLOV5
